document_data.name: Maerele Oromanche
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/417/Eye on the Realms: The Sword of Spells|27}}{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.siblings: [[Elklund Oromanche]], [[Imraphar Oromanche]], [[Odyle Oromanche]], [[Olora Oromanche]], [[Emruelle Oromanche]], and [[Haladeira Oromanche]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Maerele Oromanche''' was the eldest of the many [[Oromanche]] siblings and the head of a prominent [[Mosstonian]] merchant family in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Maerele, like virtually all members of the family, was described to have "dark, lush good looks." She was a bombastic and flamboyant woman with a strong and daring personality.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century DR, the Oromanche clan was one of the most successful merchant organizations in [[Tethyr]] and the town of Mosstone. Maerele Oromanche was the matriarch of the clan who shepherded her much younger siblings: [[Elklund Oromanche|Elklund]], [[Odyle Oromanche|Odyle]], [[Imraphar Oromanche|Imraphar]], [[Olora Oromanche|Olora]], [[Emruelle Oromanche|Emruelle]], and [[Haladeira Oromanche|Haladeira]]. Most contributed to the family's mercantile activities. [[Elminster]] of [[Shadowdale]] was a good friend of the matriarch.
